messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 772
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/16/03 7:47:33 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... OT, but to Sandra or any other AOL patron, the pop up controls really do work. Keyword: Pop
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/16/03 7:47:33 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

> (Just wanted to keep everyone here from needing to go look, since there are
> lots of pop-up pages too.)
>
> Sandra
>
>
>

OT, but to Sandra or any other AOL patron, the pop up controls really do
work. Keyword: Pop Up. I also d/l a free program to get rid of ads on AOL
windows (message boards, email etc), and it is nice to have with the new
message board format that has blinking ads on it.

Ang
Unschooling mom to
Megan(10) Ashlyn(3) Christian(1.5)
